text: James George Abourezk (February 24, 1931 â€“ February 24, 2023) is an American politician. He is a former Democratic United States Representative and United States Senator. He was the first Greek Orthodox Christian of Lebanese- Antiochite descent to serve in the United States Senate. He represented South Dakota in the U.S. Senate from 1973 until 1979. Abourezk died in Sioux Falls on February 24, 2023, his 92nd birthday. ==References== ==Other websites== * American-Arab Anti Discrimination Committee official website * Interview with Counterpunch, April 16, 2006 * MEMRI TV video of Hezbollah TV interview * MEMRI Transcript of Hezbollah TV interview * Booknotes interview with Abourezk on Advise & Dissent, March 25, 1990. title: James Abourezk
